reviewText: Fun and important messages for the safety and continuation of the species.

Hippos & RhinosJust love There's a Rhino in my house! So cute and adorabable - this baby rhino who was brought up in a farm house in the east of Zimbabwe. An absolute miracle and wonder to watch it growing up, making friends with other wild animals and meeting it's partner...
4 replays of Animal Planet segments.  a must for hippo and rhino lovers.  amazing how people can raise these large beasts in their homes.

jessica the hippo!!!!
enough said..
the rest of vids are alrigt.
but hippo makes it good enough on its own.

This DVD is a great introduction to a couple of mammals that we don't often hear much about...Hippos & Rhinos! They're actually quite adorable and they get into some funny situations in this Animal Planet DVD.  My favorite segment is the one where Cleo, a Hippo at Busch Gardens gives birth to her new baby.  My kids loved this whole DVD!
